translation.en: [man] What do you do when you get angry?
Do you have an outlet to release this anger if you can't get high?
translation.ko: 취할 수 없을 때 화를 풀 만한 수단이 있나요?

translation.en: Release this deep fucking hate I have for everyone, everything!
translation.ko: 모든 사람, 모든 것에 대한 깊은 증오를 표출하는 거야!

translation.en: [thumping chest] Just to fucking purge all this shit that eats me up!
translation.ko: 날 괴롭히는 이 모든 걸 몰아내려고!

translation.en: You may have a chance to purge soon.
in the largest drop in its history.
[reporter 3] A sub-prime mortgage crisis worse than 2008.
[reporter 4] Neighborhoods across the country destroyed by an opioid epidemic.
translation.ko: 마약성 진통제 남용이 전국 곳곳을 황폐화하고 있습니다 "마약 거래는 살인죄 말로만 하지 말라!"

translation.en: Americans are looking for a necessary change in these tumultuous times.
translation.ko: 격동의 시기에서 국민들은 변화를 요구하고 있습니다

translation.en: [reporter 6] Citizens growing angry as they face a collapsing economy.
[reporter 7] A new party is arising as a substitute to the Republicans and Democrats
calling themselves the New Founding Fathers of America.
[reporter 8] The New Founding Fathers rising in polls with the NRA now endorsing them
and supporting them financially with large donations to the NFFA war chest.
translation.ko: 총기협회도 활동 자금 기부 등 재정적으로 지원하고 있습니다

translation.en: [reporter 9] Can the NFFA seize control? Will Americans fall for their fear-mongering?
translation.ko: NFFA가 정권을 잡을 수 있을까요? 공포감 조성 전략은 성공할까요?

translation.en: with my fellow New Founding Fathers, we make this promise.

translation.ko: 나라를 다시 일으키겠습니다 "대통령 당선인 브래컨 대국민 연설"

translation.en: We will do whatever it takes to let you dream again.
translation.ko: 여러분의 꿈을 되살리기 위해 뭐든 하겠습니다

translation.en: We are now only days from this controversial experiment,
translation.ko: 논란의 중심이 된 실험이 며칠 후면 시작됩니다

translation.en: this night of legalized crime that people are now calling the Purge.
translation.ko: 퍼지라고 불리는 이날 밤은 모든 범죄가 허용됩니다 "실험 반대 시위 전국 휩쓸어"

translation.en: And there are protests all over.
Conflict between anti-Purge protesters and Purge supporters
translation.ko: 퍼지 반대자들과 지지자들 간 갈등이 오늘 아침

translation.en: broke out early today in North Carolina.
[reporter] Yes, Susan. I'm here in Charlotte.
There's been about 20 arrests so far
and we'll keep you informed as protests are continuing.
Staten Island, the chosen site, has become the focus for the entire world.
translation.ko: 실험 장소로 선택된 스태튼섬이 전 세계의 주목을 받고 있습니다

translation.en: We have reporters across the island
who will be giving live updates for the next several days.
Let's go now to correspondent Van Jones, who's in Park Hill.
translation.ko: 파크 힐에 있는 특파원 밴 존스를 연결해보겠습니다

translation.en: [Van] Yes, James. I'm here outside the Park Hill Towers,
a low-income housing project, and I can see citizens...
translation.ko: 파크 힐 타워스 밖에 있습니다 주민들이 보이고...

translation.en: [Nya] Isaiah, our tower made the news.
Have you seen Tony? My sink is leaking again.
translation.ko: 혹시 토니 보셨어요? 싱크대가 또 새서요

translation.en: I'm so sick of this piece-of-shit building!
translation.ko: 이 후진 건물 정말 신물이 난다!

translation.en: The damn elevator's down again, too.
As bad as my asthma is, got me sweating like a fucking snitch.
translation.ko: 천식이 있는 것도 모자라 죄지은 사람처럼 헐떡이고 있어

translation.en: We need five or six supers in this raggedy motherfucker!
translation.ko: 이런 허름한 건물에는 관리자가 대여섯은 있어야지!

translation.en: I'll let him know what's up if I see him.
This bullshit experiment really happening, Ny?
translation.ko: 그 괴상한 실험은 정말로 하는 거라니?

translation.en: -Talk to you later, okay? -All right, sweetie.
The Pope has continued his condemnation of the Purge.
And France's President Lemercier has called...
translation.ko: 프랑스 대통령 르머시에는 이 문제에 대해 각국에...

translation.en: [reporter] ...if the NFFA doesn't stop this, "barbaric experiment."
translation.ko: NFFA가 이 야만적인 실험을 그만두지 않으면...

translation.en: Locally, protesters have started to gather at the evaluation sites,
as well as outside local government offices.
translation.ko: 근처 정부 기관 앞에 모이기 시작했습니다

translation.en: So far, there has been no sign of violence,
but tensions are high as the clock ticks...
Just tell me what I need to do to get paid.
translation.ko: 돈을 받으려면 뭘 해야 하는지나 알려줘요

translation.en: If you remain on Staten Island during the experiment,
you will receive monetary compensation of $5,000.
You'll give me $5,000 just to stay home during this thing?
How would you know if I stayed?
We would implant a tracking device in your arm.
And if you decide to participate beyond that,
[news anchor] Let's go to our News Four on-the-scene reporter at the Park Hill Towers.
translation.ko: 파크 힐 타워스에 가 있는 기자를 연결해보겠습니다

translation.en: [reporter] This is one of a dozen sites being set up across the island
translation.ko: 이곳은 섬에 설치된 열두 군데의 실험 장소 중 하나로

translation.en: where citizens are signing up to participate in the experiment.
translation.ko: 주민들이 실험 참가 신청을 하고 있습니다

translation.en: They are also being psychologically evaluated here
translation.ko: 퍼지에 참여하기 전 정신 상태를 진단하기 위해

translation.en: to determine their mental status before they purge.
And they will be evaluated again after the experiment, if they survive,
translation.ko: 또한 '사회적 정화'로 묘사되는 이 날 밤 실험 후에도

translation.en: to see how they were affected by the night
that is being described as a "societal catharsis."
translation.ko: 어떤 영향을 받았는지 보기 위해 다시 검사를 받을 겁니다

translation.en: People around here been making fun of us our whole lives.
translation.ko: 이 동네 사람들은 평생 우리를 조롱했어요

translation.en: We keep to ourselves, but they just won't leave us alone.
translation.ko: 우리는 조용히 살고 있는데 우릴 가만히 두지 않아요

translation.en: Are you ever inclined to hurt someone?
translation.ko: 누군가를 다치게 하고 싶었던 적이 있나요?

translation.en: because its demographic is a perfect representation...
[reporter 1] There are numerous drug and street gangs on Staten Island.
Many are wondering if they'll participate.
translation.ko: 그들도 실험에 참여할지 많은 이들이 궁금해합니다

translation.en: For those staying, the financial reward seems to be the incentive.
translation.ko: 남는 사람들은 경제적 보상 때문인 듯합니다

translation.en: [reporter 2] Despite the weather conditions, the protesters are out.
They have their signs and their fists are raised.
They are against the Purge experiment that is happening.
translation.ko: 곧 일어날 퍼지 실험에 반대하는 것입니다

translation.en: Do not purge! Do not participate! Do not purge! Do not participate!
[Van] So we are here with Arlo Sabian.
He is the chief of staff for the NFFA.
He got this whole thing pushed through Congress.
Well, you got protests all over the place now.
Please. The idea of the Purge was analyzed for years.
We allowed Island citizens to vote on participation.
Yeah, and you know why? Because a lot of those people felt coerced
translation.ko: 왜 그런지는 아세요? 많은 분들이 경제적으로 힘든데

translation.en: by the fact that they don't have money, and you're offering money.
translation.ko: 돈을 준다고 하니 어쩔 수 없이 찬성한 거죠

translation.en: So what do you say to the lower income people
who are out here risking their lives tonight?
Van, as with any scientific trial, those who participate receive payment.
translation.ko: 여느 과학 실험과 마찬가지로 참가자들은 금전적 보상을 받아요

translation.en: I'm gonna turn to you, Doctor Updale.
who actually came up with this whole experiment.
A lot of people have a lot of concerns about this,
translation.ko: 많은 사람들이 다양한 우려를 표하고 있고

translation.en: and one concern comes up over and over again.
I want the truth from you.
Is the Purge a political device?
I do not work for the NFFA. I did not conceive of the experiment for them.
translation.ko: 전 NFFA 직원도 아니고 정당을 위해 고안된 실험도 아닙니다

translation.en: The NFFA had the courage to test it, but the conceit is not a political one.
translation.ko: NFFA가 실행을 허가하기는 했지만 정치적 목적은 없습니다

translation.en: The benefit of acting violently without worry of consequence,
translation.ko: 처벌을 걱정하지 않고 폭력을 행사할 수 있을 때

translation.en: A "freeing violence." Okay, that's a new one on me.
translation.ko: 처벌에 대한 걱정 없이 폭력을 쓸 수 있다는 건데요

translation.en: I have a question for you.
What is your definition of success?
Well, the level of participation in certain areas is key.
The Park Hill Towers, for example,
are the center of this community.
I think that'll be a strong indication that this night is a great success.
translation.ko: 이 실험이 성공적으로 진행될 거라고 볼 수 있겠죠

translation.en: They have monetized and incentivized murder!
The wealthy areas are already clearing!
But the NFFA knew that we, the impoverished,
translation.ko: 하지만 우리처럼 가난한 자들은 돈을 주면 남을 거라는 걸

translation.en: would stay if there was monetary gain.
This is another way to keep the brown and black people down!
translation.ko: 유색인종을 짓누르기 위한 또 다른 수단일 뿐입니다!

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Do not purge! Do not participate! Do not purge! Do not participate!
You really think these regular folk
gonna pop each other like gangsters when the time comes?
translation.ko: 폭력배처럼 정말 서로를 죽일 거라 생각해?

translation.en: Shit yeah. People pissed, they ain't got no money.
They ain't got no food. They gotta release their anger.
translation.ko: 먹을 것도 없으니 화를 풀 곳이 필요하겠지

translation.en: Bullshit. They participate, it'll be for that paper. Trust me.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 참여한다면 분명 돈 때문일 거야

translation.en: They gonna steal, act like clowns and all that,
but there ain't gonna be that much killing.
-Nah, killing comes from the heart, B. -Yeah.
These people, they don't got that type of damage.
Do not purge! Do not participate!
You come to see the show?
All three of you old men out today?
What's the occasion? Am I the luckiest man in the world?
translation.ko: 무슨 일이야? 세상에, 이런 광경도 보네

translation.en: Nah. We the Three Wise Men.
Man, who are you fuckers kidding? We the Three Stooges on our best day.
translation.ko: 웃기고 있네 잘 쳐줘야 세 얼간이일 뿐이야

translation.en: What you think about all this here, Fred?
This is the greatest shit show on Earth.
They turning our island into ancient Rome. Our hood into the Colosseum.
translation.ko: 섬을 고대 로마로 만드는 거지 동네가 콜로세움으로 변하는 거라고

translation.en: Now, the question is, are we gonna be the Christians or the lions?
Stay safe, Three. If you need anything...
translation.ko: 셋 다 몸조심해 필요한 거 있으면...

translation.en: We three okay, man. We done seen it all and then some.
We three, we've been through some shit.
You here to participate or protest?
translation.ko: 참여하러 온 거야 시위하러 온 거야?

translation.en: Still fighting the good fight, woman?
Oh, I see. No cops, no law.
Sounds like a dream come true for a man in your business.
translation.ko: 너 같은 일을 하는 남자에게는 천국이나 다름없겠네

translation.en: You got me wrong on this one, Ny. I don't like it.
translation.ko: 아니야, 잘못 봤어 나도 마음에 안 들어

translation.en: I don't know what it is.
When I don't know exactly what something is,
[Kels] Hey, yo, pocket that money quick, son.
And then send these niggas on their way, a'ight?
translation.ko: 그리고 빨리 가던 길 가게 해 알았지?

translation.en: Man, listen. We one of Dmitri's top corners 'cause we keep shit moving.
translation.ko: 우리가 쉬지 않고 움직여서 드미트리가 좋은 구역을 준 거야
누나가 너 여기 있는 거 알아?

translation.en: Come by the shop, you want a job.
You got a customer. The customer. The one and only.
[sniffs] Mmm. Yeah, I smell your sweat.
What the fuck you talking about, nigga?
Our first transaction's on you, hmm?
A little initiation fee to get my biz with your fine-ass sister.
translation.ko: 네 탐스러운 누나를 갖기 위한 수수료라고 할까

translation.en: Hey, yo, fuck you, fiend! Move on!
Get the fuck outta my face, man!
A blood baptism for Innocent I.
Sure enough. See, that's what the doctor ordered!
[men] We out! We out! We out!
Hey, yo, clear out, yo! Hey, yo, come on, Isaiah. Come on.
translation.ko: 다들 어서 흩어져! 아이제이아, 가자, 어서

translation.en: [Dmitri] I called y'all here to discuss this experiment.
translation.ko: 실험 얘기를 하려고 여기 모이라고 한 거다

translation.en: I don't give a shit what other people do during Purge night.
translation.ko: 퍼지 밤에 다른 사람들이 뭘 하든 난 상관 안 해

translation.en: I care about what you all do.
You get hurt or you die, I lose money.
translation.ko: 너희들이 다치거나 죽으면 난 돈을 잃는 거야
난 손해 보는 장사 안 해

translation.en: Niggas might use the night to make a move on us.
Maybe the police might use the night to take out motherfuckers like us. Who knows?
translation.ko: 경찰들이 오늘 밤 우릴 없애려 들지도 모르고

translation.en: The point is, we gotta be prepared for anything.
translation.ko: 요점은 그 어떤 상황에도 대비해야 한다는 거야

translation.en: We stay inside and we protect what needs protecting.
translation.ko: 밖에 나가지 말고 지켜야 할 것을 지켜

translation.en: Our kin, our skin, our product, and our money.
translation.ko: 우리 자신과 가족들 우리 물건과 돈을 지켜

translation.en: Yo, D. We should all just go to Brooklyn.
translation.ko: 우리 모두 브루클린으로 가는 게 좋을 것 같아

translation.en: You know what I mean? So we won't even take a chance.
Nah, we can't move our money or our stash off the island. It's too risky.
translation.ko: 돈이나 마약을 섬에서 빼내는 건 너무 위험해

translation.en: And it'll make us look weak.
Come on, my G! This is bullshit!
I wanna fucking purge, man! I wanna tear shit up and have some fucking fun!
translation.ko: 나도 퍼지에 뛰어들고 싶어! 마구 부수면서 즐기고 싶다고!

translation.en: [scoffs] For the first time in my life, I could be a law-abiding citizen.
translation.ko: 내 생애 처음으로 법을 따르는 시민이 될 기회잖아

translation.en: If you so much as blink, Blaise'll remove the skin from your face, fat man.
translation.ko: 눈이라도 깜빡이면 블레이즈가 얼굴 가죽을 벗길 거다

translation.en: She does exactly what I say. You know why?
translation.ko: 내가 시키는 대로 하거든 왠지 알아?

translation.en: We're family. I put food on her table, I put money in her pocket.
translation.ko: 가족이니까 난 얘가 먹고살 수 있게 해줘

translation.en: My only question for you is,
I put food on your table,
why don't I get the same type of discipline from your big ass?
Let's get through this Purge bullshit -so we can get back to business as usual. -[cell phone buzzing]
translation.ko: 퍼지 따위를 잘 견뎌야 다시 평소대로 일할 수 있다

translation.en: Did you hear what happened at Fourth and...
Isaiah, what's going on? Why's there blood on the floor? You good?
translation.ko: 아이제이아, 무슨 일이야? 왜 바닥에 피가 있어? 괜찮아?

translation.en: You need facial hair in order to shave, boy! Open up the door
translation.ko: 수염도 없으면서 무슨 면도야? 문 열어

translation.en: -or I'll kick it in. You know I will. -[door rattling]
translation.ko: 부수고 들어가기 전에 누나 성질 알잖아

translation.en: Jesus Christ! What happened to your neck?
[player] Get it out, get it out.
We're gonna have at least 20 soldiers surrounding this place,
translation.ko: 퍼지 실험 때 여길 지키는 보초를

translation.en: keeping it secure during the experiment.
[Lorenzo] Me and Blaise'll be at the stash house
with about two dozen niggas on the perimeter.
The eyes, Terence! The eyes, the eyes!
Your eyes went right to Aesop.
Now, me, you, everybody know you tossing to Sop.
You ain't talking but you telling me everything, man.
translation.ko: 말은 안 해도 전부 알려주고 있잖아

translation.en: Everything else is good money, a'ight?
-Let's keep up the pace, a'ight, boys? -Whoa, what're you doing?
Of course. Run it from the top!
[Nya] Let me through! Get your hands off of me!
Put your hands on me one more time,
I'll rip your fucking balls off! Believe dat.
To what do I owe this...
Cut the shit. I need to talk to you now!
translation.ko: 헛소리 집어치워 당장 얘기 좀 해!

translation.en: -I don't believe you! -Yo, what is it? What's up?
translation.ko: - 네가 어떻게 이래? - 왜 이래? 뭔데?

translation.en: by some junkie off one of your corners!
translation.ko: 방금 어떤 마약쟁이가 아이제이아를 칼로 벴어

translation.en: -Is he all right? -He's gonna be fine.
He didn't wanna go to the hospital
'cause he was too afraid I was gonna find out he's been hooking school,
translation.ko: 지난주에 네 구역에서 일하느라 학교 무단결석한 거

translation.en: working the corner for the past week!
I had no idea he was involved, Nya.
You think I know who works my corners? Nya, come on! Nya!
translation.ko: 내 구역에서 일하는 애들을 내가 다 알 것 같아? 왜 이래?

translation.en: I would never let Isaiah get anywhere close to the business.
translation.ko: 아이제이아가 하는 걸 알았다면 절대 그냥 두지 않았을 거야

translation.en: I watched that boy grow up.
He wanted to make life a little bit easier for us with some extra cash.
translation.ko: 현금 좀 보태서 우리 생활이 편해지길 바랐지

translation.en: And I told you I would give you money for that.
I'll never take your blood money.
translation.ko: 피 묻은 네 돈 절대 안 받아

translation.en: [breath trembling] I tried talking to him.
I tried being his mother, his father, his brother, his sister!
translation.ko: 부모, 형, 누나 노릇을 하려고 했다고!

translation.en: But, clearly, I'm not doing a good enough job! Clearly, I can be...
translation.ko: 근데 제대로 못 했나 봐 정말이지 난...

translation.en: I want you to stay with me during the Purge, a'ight?
translation.ko: 퍼지 실험 동안 나랑 같이 있어

translation.en: As far as that... As far as that fiend who hurt your brother,
translation.ko: 네 동생을 건드린 그 악마 같은 놈은

translation.en: I'mma take care of that, a'ight?
What you gonna do? You gonna hurt him, kill him?
translation.ko: 어쩔 건데? 해칠 거야? 죽일 거야?

translation.en: No, no, no. 'Cause that's your answer to everything.
Today, it was two people we know.
But every day, it's at least two who are hurt 'cause of you, D!
[scoffs] Come on. I grew up here, too.
translation.ko: 왜 이래 나도 이 동네에서 컸어

translation.en: We all have to make choices in life
to heal or to hurt, and you chose the latter.
translation.ko: 치유할지 해칠지 선택해야 해 넌 후자를 택했고

translation.en: Don't you care about this Purge? Or what it could do to our community?
translation.ko: 이 퍼지 실험이 우리 동네에 무슨 짓을 해도 상관없어?

translation.en: Now, the Purge is one day.
destroy this community 364 days a year.
The man I knew and loved years ago had courage and had soul.
translation.ko: 내가 몇 년 전 알고 사랑했던 남자는 용기와 영혼이 있었어

translation.en: But thank you for the invite. I, uh...
-But we're gonna be fine without you, D. -Oh.
Stay the fuck away from us, Dmitri.
[woman] Thank you for your honest answers.

translation.en: The official flower of the experiment. They represent rebirth.
translation.ko: 이 실험의 공식 꽃으로 부활을 상징합니다

translation.en: In the box, you have recording lenses. Contacts.
Should you choose to actively participate,
wear them on the evening and they'll document everything you do.
As I said, greater participation yields greater financial compensation.
Next, we'll implant a tracking device.
After that you'll be all set, as they say,
-[man 1] What do you mean I can't get off? -[man 2] Let me through!
translation.ko: - 갈 수 없다니 무슨 말이죠? - 지나가게 해줘요!

translation.en: [Luisa] A lot of people you know are gonna be there. Okay?

translation.en: Why can't we just stay home?
translation.ko: 그냥 집에 있으면 왜 안 돼요?

translation.en: This is the safest place in the neighborhood.
I'm gonna take care of you. I won't let anything happen. Okay, mamita?
translation.ko: 내가 돌봐줄게 아무 일도 없을 거야

translation.en: Hey! I didn't expect to see you.
I thought you would've left the island by now.
Oh, I was going to, but, you know, the money, Nya. $5,000 to stay?
Pastor Almory opened up -the church to everyone. -Hmm.
Okay? We got cots, there's gonna be security at the door,
translation.ko: 침대도 있고 문 앞엔 안전 요원도 있어요

translation.en: And Pastor's gonna deliver a sermon later tonight.
translation.ko: 목사님이 오늘 밤 설교도 하실 거고요

translation.en: Pastor's a wonderful man, but his sermons bore me to death.
translation.ko: 목사님 정말 훌륭하시지만 설교는 너무 지겹더라

translation.en: [Nya] Why don't you make yourselves at home? Anything you need.
translation.ko: 편하게 지내세요 필요한 건 뭐든 쓰세요

translation.en: A block away from Uncle T's place.
[nervously] I got the last bus off the island.
Yeah. I wish you were with me.
I know, I know. But I just had to get as many people off the street
translation.ko: 그러게, 최대한 많은 사람을 교회 안으로 데려오느라

translation.en: and into the church as I could.
[news anchor 1] There are candlelight vigils happening all over the country.
Now, let's go to Anne with footage from just moments ago.

translation.en: That is the last of the buses leaving the island.
translation.ko: 섬을 떠나는 마지막 버스입니다 "스태튼섬 실험 시작되다"

translation.en: The last ferry left minutes ago.
And the questions on everyone's mind remain the same.
that this is a night America needs?
And now, we're going to take you live to the White House,
where President Bracken will address the citizens of Staten Island
and the nation for the start of the first experiment.
translation.ko: 전 국민들에게 첫 실험의 시작을 선포할 겁니다

translation.en: The courageous citizens of Staten Island,
translation.ko: "브래컨 대통령 대국민 연설" 스태튼섬의 용감한 주민분들

translation.en: those pioneers will be part of something that could bring about great change.
translation.ko: 이 개척자들은 훌륭한 변화를 가져올 일의 일부가 될 겁니다

translation.en: We are all Staten Islanders tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 우리는 모두 스태튼섬 주민입니다

translation.en: This is your Emergency Broadcast System
announcing the commencement of the NFFA Social Experiment

translation.en: Weapons of class four and lower
have been authorized for use during the experiment.
All crime, including murder, will be legal for 12 continuous hours.

translation.en: Blessed be our New Founding Fathers and America, a nation reborn.
translation.ko: 새로운 건국을 위한 NFFA와 새로 태어난 미국에 축복을

translation.en: May God be with you all.
You been charging me money to take out my money?
translation.ko: 내 돈 내가 찾겠다는데 수수료를 붙였지?

translation.en: Fuck that, I want my fucking money back.
[grunts] 20s, 50s, 100s, or whatever this shit is, I want that shit right back. [grunts]

translation.en: Is this the first of the night?
I got my list. Y'all got y'all's?
From tonight on, no more bullshit!
From nobody! No one, no thing!
From now on, just our shit!
Fuck Dmitri! This is my kingdom.
translation.ko: 드미트리는 꺼지라고 해! 여긴 내 왕국이야

translation.en: It's our night, fellas! Y'all ready to run down?
[news anchor] And just back from Staten Island
and joining me here in the studio is Anne.
Anne, what was the atmosphere like out there?
Uh, well, you know, people were...
They wanted to see if this could work.
I spoke to both the anti-Purge protesters

translation.en: ...by how much support that they've had. But they were worried...
We believe that this is the first purge of the evening.
translation.ko: 이게 오늘 밤 첫 퍼지인 것 같아요

translation.en: Fat-ass Cap A didn't show up to work today.

translation.en: Bet you this motherfucker out there purging.
translation.ko: 이 망할 놈 퍼지 하고 있나 봐

translation.en: If you need company, we got the girls on the way.
Well, you should keep 'em around just in case you get bored.
translation.ko: 지루해질 수도 있으니 그냥 데리고 있어

translation.en: Call me if you need anything else, bro.
On this dreaded night, do we descend?
That is the question that we all must ask ourselves.
translation.ko: 우리 자신에게 물어야 할 질문입니다 "드미트리 너 안전해?"

translation.en: "Although I walk through the valley in the shadow of death..."
[softly] I found Pastor's secret stash in his office.
-He's got a whole bar up there. -Are you kidding me?
Monopoly is not gonna get me through this night.
translation.ko: 그래도 혼자 밤을 지새울 순 없겠더라고

translation.en: Don't ask me how I know.
translation.ko: 그 맛을 어떻게 아는진 묻지 마

translation.en: You sure you don't want a swig?
Okay. Gonna be a long night.
the sun shall rise in the morning.

translation.ko: 오늘 밤은 안 돼, 어린 친구

translation.en: [Capital A] You see me kill that motherfucker, boy?
What you think you gonna do with that?
I'm exercising my right to purge by taking all your merch!
translation.ko: 나한텐 너희 잡상인들 죽일 권리가 있다고!

translation.en: And if you stand in my way,
I'm coming for my free shit!
-Hey, back the fuck up, nigga! -[Kels] Chill, chill!
Damn, K! You scared the shit outta me, son.
Man, what the hell you doing out here by yourself?
You out here looking for Skeletor, ain't you?
Motherfucker made you look like a little bitch.

translation.en: Now you trying to save some face.
Man, screw that shit, yo. Roll with us.
It's a Purge party down the block.
What the hell is a Purge party, my nigga?
Nigga, I don't know. Could be fun though.

translation.en: There are actually a couple across the island.
[announcer on TV] CNB. Breaking news from Staten Island.
It's being reported as the first kill,

Hey, come with me. Help me with the other kids.

translation.en: There's something wrong with the world, isn't there, Nya?
But we have to keep trying to fix it.
-[indistinct muttering] -[reporter 2] This is very disturbing, but it is what we expected to see tonight.

translation.en: It is very hard to process that what we are looking at here is actually legal,
translation.ko: 방금 보신 장면이 허용된다는 게 견디기 힘듭니다

translation.en: that there is no punishment for this inhumane act.
translation.ko: 이런 비인간적 행위가 처벌되지 않는다는 게 말이죠

translation.en: [woman 2] Are you looking at this, bro?
Hey, yo, Zay! Check this out, bro.
It's the first kill of the night. 20 million views already.

translation.en: Damn! That's some animal shit, man!
But I'm out. I'mma go find that psycho.

translation.en: [Elsa] Queens ready to party with the kings!
Call me if you need anything.
You already know where the bar is.
[Dmitri, laughing] Well, y'all getting it poppin'.
You gotta be fucking kidding me!
More money than we'd see in ten lifetimes doing the shit we do.
translation.ko: 평생 이런 일 하면서 만질 수 없는 액수야

translation.en: Where you gonna run to, Isaiah?
The basic tenets of morality have to be abandoned.
[news anchor] And to this point, we've seen mostly looting and vandalism,
translation.ko: 지금까지 섬 도처에서 목격된 건 대부분

translation.en: with only a few instances of real violence across the island.
translation.ko: 강도와 공공 기물 파손으로 진짜 폭력적인 일은 몇 건뿐입니다

translation.en: [news anchor 2] Take for example, the Park Hill Towers, the center of the community.

translation.en: Many people are looking at them as a gauge of the Purge's success.
translation.ko: 많은 이들이 이곳을 퍼지 성공을 가늠하는 장소로 봅니다

translation.en: But so far, it's been relatively quiet.
[woman] I told you he's over there!

translation.ko: 너 이 자식 우리가 잡을 거다!

translation.en: [Nya] Hey! Just calling to check in. How's Brooklyn? How's Uncle T?
translation.ko: 그냥 잘 있나 전화해봤어 브루클린 어때? 삼촌은?
그 망할 놈이 우릴 죽이려고 했어

translation.en: For his sake, I wish he hadn't.
Get the fuck off of me! What are you doing?
Get your fucking hands off of me!
[woman] I told you he's over there!
No more! See, I gotta get paid!
translation.ko: 더는 안 돼! 돈 받아야 하거든!

translation.en: I ain't think y'all was gonna pull it off.
that bitch-ass nigga beg for his life?
translation.ko: 그 계집 같은 놈이 살려달라고 빌든?

translation.en: Your time is up now, A.
-Hope the crown felt good. -Yo. Yo, D.
that you could use their purge to take my ass out,
translation.ko: 날 없앨 수 있을 거라 생각했나 본데

translation.en: but didn't anybody tell you, A?
I don't know how to die. [chuckles]

translation.ko: 넌 날 퍼지 할 수 없어

translation.en: Take care of these fools, man.
But make sure that they know never to step foot on this island again.
translation.ko: 대신 다시는 이 섬에 발도 못 붙이게 해

translation.en: You predicted a much higher level of participation.
This is an experiment. There are variables.
Behavioral patterns vary according to environment.
that this socioeconomic group is not reacting the way that I predicted.
translation.ko: 이 사회경제 집단은 제 예상과 다르게 반응해요

translation.en: I don't give a shit why.
The NFFA put a lot of faith into this evening.
If it's deemed ineffective, the entire regime could be judged as a failure.
translation.ko: 효과가 없으면 정권 전체를 실패로 간주하겠죠

translation.en: I told you that science does not obey the laws of politics.
translation.ko: 과학은 정치의 법칙을 따르지 않는다고 했잖아요

translation.en: My job is to analyze this data, nothing more.
translation.ko: 제 일은 이 데이터를 분석하는 게 다예요

translation.en: Yes, sir, we're looking at the data right now.
[Nya] We gotta get to the church. We'll be safe there.
translation.ko: 교회까지 가야 해 거긴 안전할 거야

translation.en: Are we gonna talk or what?
What do you want me to say?
That I'm wrong and I'm sorry?
That I learned my lesson tonight?
Or that I was just being plain-ass stupid?
Yeah, that's what I want you to say.
I fucking hate our apartment, Nya.
The fact that we never have anything for anything.
I don't like it either. But there are other ways.
translation.ko: 나도 싫어 근데 다른 길도 있어

translation.en: I ain't seeing a way out, Nya.
I saw a lot of stupid shit.
I've been down this road before, and I saw a way out.
Just let me help you see it, too.
Come on, man. We don't want no problem.
Where the hell did they come from?
We are seeing an interesting trend emerging tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 흥미로운 일을 보고 있습니다 "트렌드: 가면 쓴 퍼지 참가자들"

translation.en: Some of the people participating in violence
have been seen wearing masks and disguises.
The whole world is watching and wondering,
what will unfold on Staten Island streets tonight?
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 스태튼섬에서는 어떤 일이 일어날까요?

translation.en: [news anchor 2] And psychologists are already speculating
about why they're doing this, why they're disguising their identities.
translation.ko: 이들이 왜 자신을 감추는지 추측하고 있습니다

translation.en: Is it that the participants are ashamed of this need,
ashamed that they want to commit these acts of violence?
translation.ko: 폭력을 저지르고 싶다는 게 부끄러운 걸까요?

translation.en: [Dr. Updale] Have you seen the chief?
Or is the regalia just a chance for them to add ceremony and jubilee

translation.en: So I released my anger, right?
I purged, right? I'm a new man now, right? [7&7] Uh-huh.
-That's dumb shit. -[7&7] Yo, boss, I was thinking.
You want me to try to find some new girls to bring up to your office tonight?
Look at these crazy fuckers buckin' the system, yo!
I mean, that's illegal, so I guess they purging, too.
translation.ko: 저건 불법이니 저들도 퍼지 하나 보네

translation.en: Yo, I purge like that any night.
Zo, we're gonna need some help.
[man] I got like five of 'em, man.
[man 3] Let's go get some more, man!
A large group of people are participating on Main and Third.
on multiple screens. Participation levels increasing.
translation.ko: 여러 화면에 보여요 참여도가 늘고 있어요

translation.en: Purgers everywhere, especially in low-income areas.
translation.ko: 사방에서 퍼지가 나타납니다 특히 저소득 지역에서요

translation.en: All data supported early violent behavior and then a downturn.
translation.ko: 모든 데이터가 초반 폭력 후 감소한다고 했어요

translation.en: Where are these gangs coming from?
translation.ko: 이 범죄 조직은 어디서 온 거죠?

translation.en: [news anchor 1] Islanders are now taking to the streets
as we are witnessing waves of violence
translation.ko: 여러분은 지금 범죄의 물결을 보고 계십니다

translation.en: [news anchor 2] The governor is sending 500 state troopers...
This is a good thing for both of us.
Jesus Christ! You scared the shit out of me!
What the hell happened in there?
About a dozen of them started shooting at everyone.
We had to pretend we were dead.
We covered ourselves in somebody else's blood.
Dolores. Dolores? Where's Dolores? Have you seen her?
We don't know! We don't know where she is.
She left earlier. She went looking for you.
Isaiah, try Dolores' cell. See if you can find her.
We can't be out here anymore. Let's get to my apartment now!
translation.ko: 우리 여기 있으면 안 돼요 당장 우리 아파트로 가요!

translation.en: They all got the same ink.
[Lorenzo] Mercs. Saw these fuckers overseas after I enlisted.
translation.ko: 용병이야, 입대 후 파병 가서 본 적 있어

translation.en: They'll work for anyone anywhere as long as the cash is correct.
translation.ko: 수지타산만 맞으면 어디서든 누굴 위해서든 일해

translation.en: Like Blackwater back in the days.
Usually ex-military. And not just American.
translation.ko: 보통 전직 군인이야 미국인만 있는 것도 아니고

translation.en: These fuckers are the real deal.
[Dr. Updale] Show me Park and Fourth ten minutes ago.
Use drones, street cams, whatever you need access to
translation.ko: 드론과 도로 카메라 구할 수 있는 대로 다 써서

translation.en: to see where the hell they came from.
[Arlo] There's purging going on all over the city.
Sir, we have a breach inside our private office.
translation.ko: 우리 사무실 내에서 보안 침입이 감지됐습니다

translation.en: [Roenick] I tracked those trucks all the way across the island to here.
translation.ko: 섬 전역에 트럭을 추적하니 여기로 나왔어요

translation.en: A remote area of abandoned factories.
Watch this now. At around midnight, something strange happens.
translation.ko: 이것 좀 보세요, 자정 경에 뭔가 이상한 일이 일어나요

translation.en: I did a vehicle search on all systems, and every one of these vehicles
translation.ko: 모든 시스템에서 차량 조회를 했더니 모든 차량이

translation.en: ended up in Park Hill, Mariners Harbor, and Stapleton.
translation.ko: 파크 힐, 마리너스 하버 그리고 스테이플턴으로 나왔어요

translation.en: The low-income areas of the island.

translation.ko: 교회, 아파트 빌딩 퍼지 파티 등요

translation.en: The gangs know where people are gathering because of the tracking implants.
translation.ko: 범죄 조직들은 추적 장치 때문에 사람들이 어디 모이는지 아는 거죠

translation.en: How would gangs know how to monitor the tracking implants?
translation.ko: 범죄 조직이 어떻게 추적 장치를 모니터할 수 있죠?

translation.en: I want all this footage on a flash drive.
translation.ko: 이 영상 전부 USB 드라이브에 담아줘요

translation.en: Did you really think you could just snoop around an NFFA building?
translation.ko: NFFA 빌딩을 몰래 들어와도 된다고 생각해요?

translation.en: You're sending soldiers into the island disguised as gangs, as citizens,
translation.ko: 조직원, 주민으로 변장한 군인을 보낸 거잖아요

translation.en: hunting people down using the tracking implants.
translation.ko: 추적 장치를 이용해서 사람들을 죽이고 있죠

translation.en: You're making it look like people are participating
translation.ko: 사람들이 참여하는 것처럼 보이게 만들고 있군요
이 나라는 인구 밀도가 너무 높아, 범죄율도 너무 높고

translation.en: There's too much crime. Too much unemployment--
translation.ko: 이 나라는 인구 밀도가 너무 높아, 범죄율도 너무 높고 - 실업률도 높고 - 사실이긴 해요?

translation.en: Is that even true or did you falsify those numbers, too?
...government that can't afford to take care of its own citizenry.
translation.ko: 파산한 정부는 시민을 관리할 돈도 없어요

translation.en: People don't want us to raise taxes,
our debt has tripled. We can't pay for anything.
translation.ko: 우리 빚은 세 배로 늘었지 돈이 없다고요

translation.en: All right? Something needed to be done.
You tell me. Because we exhausted every possibility.
I need for this to work.
I need to sell this on a country-wide scale
because this is our last hope.
You're trying to depopulate the lower classes
just so the NFFA doesn't have to support them.
We both know there's no easy answer
translation.ko: 쉬운 답이란 없다는 거 우리 둘 다 알잖아요
혹은 어떤 집단이 고통받지 않는 답 말이죠

translation.en: The American people don't need this.
-I'm terribly sorry. -Do not build this on a lie!
The NFFA and America will remember you fondly.
As a hero to your nation.
[man 2 over radio] Alpha unit leaving Amsterdam and Oswald.
We know people on that corner. Let's go!
It's getting hot out here, D.
We got to get out these streets. Got to get home, like, now.
translation.ko: 거리에서 벗어나야 해 당장 집으로 가자

translation.en: [Isaiah] Come on, guys. We're almost there.
Only two hours left in this experiment,
and the island is a war zone.
[reporter] Yes, Susan. The NFFA have been releasing
translation.ko: "스태튼섬 실험 곧 종료" 네, 수전 NFFA는 참여자 일부가

translation.en: firsthand footage from some of the participants.
[reporter] The images have been coming in at a furious pace over the last few hours.
translation.ko: 지난 몇 시간 동안 엄청난 속도로 영상이 들어오고 있습니다

translation.en: Some of the footage looks like a battle zone.
Isaiah injured his neck the other day. It was a lot of blood.
translation.ko: 아이제이아가 저번에 목을 다쳐서 피를 많이 흘렸어요

translation.en: I thought I cleaned it all up.
Look, it's nothing you need to worry about.
It's just, this is so crazy!
and I think about this night.
What they're doing to this country. I'm worried about this country.
translation.ko: 이 나라에 하는 짓 그리고 이 나라가 걱정돼

translation.en: I'm worried about our future, you know?
We're not gonna let anything happen to her.
translation.ko: 셀리나에게 아무 일도 없게 할 거예요

translation.en: Gear up and load the trucks.
[Lorenzo] Every soldier we have is on their way.
[7&7] Check this out. I got some brand-new shit this week.
translation.ko: 이것 좀 봐 이번 주에 새로운 거 구했지

translation.en: Gun dealer said we got a big new batch from an unknown supplier.
translation.ko: 무기상 말로는 익명의 공급자가 새 무기를 대량으로 줬대

translation.en: I snatched it all up, yo.
It's like C-4 with a handheld detonator.
translation.ko: 기폭 장치가 있는 C4 같은 거야

translation.en: NFFA been putting all this shit in the streets, y'all.
Hoping that we'd off each other.
and now they're stoking the fire in another motherfucking way!
Our neighborhood is under siege, gentlemen,
from a government who doesn't give a shit about any of us!
Now, there's a lotta good people out there,
who we're gonna have to protect now.
See, the NFFA forgot about one thing.
So let's show these white-haired motherfuckers
never to fuck with our island again.
translation.ko: 우리 섬을 건드리지 말라고 본때를 보여주자

translation.en: Thank you, sir. That's more than we could've imagined.
Yeah, it seems like the people really needed this.
translation.ko: 네, 사람들에게 정말 필요했던 것 같습니다

translation.en: -[banging on door] -[Dolores] It's me! It's Dolores! Open up!
Well, I guess nobody missed me, huh?
I was out there looking for your little narrow ass!
I was scared to death out there! I lost my damn cell phone!
translation.ko: 무서워 죽는 줄 알았어! 망할 휴대폰도 잃어버리고!

translation.en: I couldn't call nobody for help!
Then I get the bubble guts,
tried to run home. That was a bad idea 'cause I realized
translation.ko: 집까지 뛰려고 했지 근데 좋은 생각이 아니었어

translation.en: I don't have my asthma pump!
'Cause I shit on myself a little bit -when I was on my way home. -[all chuckling]
My fucking bowels done joined the Purge, too!
[mercenary 1 on speaker] We have three four-man fire teams,
all equipped with M4 assault rifles,
[male dispatcher] Citizens are mounting a resistance against Charlie team on Fourth and Bay.
translation.ko: 4번가와 베이가에 찰리 팀에 대항한 반란 주민이 모이고 있다

translation.en: -Oh, shit! Shit! -[Freddy] Come on, come on!
[man 2] To the right! To the right!
[man 3] To the right. To the right.
You kill as many of them motherfuckers as you can.
translation.ko: 저 망할 놈들 닥치는 대로 다 죽여

translation.en: as I live and breathe! The devil himself.
translation.ko: 이게 누구신가 호랑이도 제 말 하면

translation.en: Let's get these Wise Men some more weapons.
[mercenary] Beta on Second, en route to Towers with Echo.
[7&7] Yo, D. You gotta hear this.
translation.ko: 이봐, 드미트리 이거 좀 들어 봐

translation.en: Proceed to housing project towers on Main and Bay.
What the hell is going on now?

translation.ko: 이 망할 놈들 벌써 여기 왔어!

translation.en: We know these towers better than whoever they are.
translation.ko: 이 타워는 누구보다 네가 잘 알잖아

translation.en: 7, I want you to go through the back with Blaise, a'ight?
Have everyone else come out the emergency exits
on the south side and wait for me and Zo.
Me and Zo, we're gonna go through the...
No, you gotta go to the Towers.
Coño, this is not a gang.
No, this is some straight bullshit. That's a fucking militia.
translation.ko: 이건 말도 안 돼 빌어먹을 민병대잖아 여기서 빠져나가야 해

translation.en: -We need to try to sneak outta here. -[Nya] How?
translation.ko: 빌어먹을 민병대잖아 여기서 빠져나가야 해 어떻게요?

translation.en: They're coming in through all the exits. Front, back, sides.
translation.ko: 모든 문으로 들어오잖아요 앞문, 뒷문, 옆문

translation.en: -So, what do we do? -We hole up and arm ourselves
with anything we can find, and fight.
[Dmitri on phone] Here's what's gonna happen, Nya.
They're gonna move from floor to floor, killing as many as they can, okay?
translation.ko: 저들은 층마다 돌아다니며 닥치는 대로 죽일 거야

translation.en: You on the 14th floor, so you got time.
I want you to move to the back of the apartment
and you find a safe place to hide, a'ight?
[Nya] Help me out. Come on, come on.
[Nya] Push it against the door, come on.
[Captain] What the fuck is going on? Someone's hit!

translation.ko: - 누나, 야구 방망이 어디 있어? - 옷장에

translation.en: Yo, what the hell is all this? We having a fucking barbecue or something?
translation.ko: 이게 대체 다 뭐야? 바비큐 먹는 거냐?

translation.en: Oh, shoot! I forgot something, y'all.
-Selina, look in here. -[Dolores] Check this out.
translation.ko: - 셀리나, 이것 좀 봐 - 이것 좀 봐

translation.en: I'm a big girl, I can handle it.
No way, Dolores. Have you used that gun before?
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼요, 돌로레스 총 써본 적 있어요?

translation.en: -[gun clicks] -There's only five bullets in here.
They'll be coming through this door.
They're gonna have on body armor.
Isaiah, you jump in and finish them off with a knife.
Who the fuck was your old boyfriend?
-We're in this together! -[Nya] No matter what happens,
-Go! -Nah, I'm not getting in no closet.
translation.ko: 어서 가요! - 가세요! - 싫어, 난 옷장에 안 들어가

translation.en: I'm staying out here with you.
Yo, this is my fucking fight, too. Let's do this.
I can't get his arm through.
Yo, what the fuck is really going on? I'm confused.
and Dmitri Cimber, the big fucking dog of Park Hill.
Well, now I know how you know how to use that gun so damn good.
translation.ko: 그 총을 왜 그리 잘 쓰나 이제 알겠네

translation.en: We got a lotta talking to do after all this is done, a'ight?
translation.ko: 다 끝나면 우리 할 말 많다, 그렇지?

translation.en: [dispatcher on radio] Unit Three, what's your sitrep on the 14th?
-Is there anyone else here? -Yeah, in the closet.
translation.ko: - 여기 다른 사람 있어? - 응, 옷장에

translation.en: -You'll be joining them, Nya. -Why? What's up?
translation.ko: - 나이야, 너도 같이 가 - 왜? 무슨 일이야?

translation.en: No time to explain. Help me with this body, Isaiah.
translation.ko: 설명할 시간 없어, 아이제이아 시체 치우는 거 도와줘

translation.en: I got one chance to stop it, but I gotta do it alone.
translation.ko: 막을 기회는 딱 한 번이야 나 혼자 해야 해

translation.en: -What're you talking about, alone? -[Dmitri] No time to explain.
-Get in the closet now. -But, D, it's almost over.
translation.ko: 이제 옷장에 들어가 근데 드미트리 거의 끝났잖아

translation.en: Almost doesn't count tonight, man. Let's go!
translation.ko: '거의'라는 말은 오늘 안 통해, 어서 가자!

translation.en: Do not make a sound. Do not come out.
And don't you try to talk me out of it either. It won't work.
translation.ko: 날 설득하려 들지도 마 안 통하니까

translation.en: You're gonna get killed out there.
I want you to just throw it
[Dmitri] It's not all my blood. I'll be...
-Nya. You all right? -[Nya] Help him up. Help him.
-[Dmitri groaning] -[Nya] Slow, go slow, go slow.
We need to make sure nobody else needs help.
translation.ko: 도움 필요한 사람이 더 없는지 확인해야지

translation.en: [Dolores] All right, now, make a path.
-Way to go, Dmitri. You saved us, baby. -[Dolores] Are y'all deaf?
translation.ko: - 잘했어, 드미트리, 우릴 구했어 - 다들 귀먹었어?

translation.en: Big dog of Park Hill is coming through.
[man] Good looking out, D. We owe you one.
[Dolores] Move back. I'm not gonna ask twice.
I've had a very, very long night.
So what do we do now?
[Arlo] Well, the turnout was bigger than we ever expected.
have proven that this experiment was necessary.
We will, of course, study the results,
but I've received word from President Bracken
that we're considering a nationwide Purge,
as the people are now calling it,
One where every U.S. citizen can participate.
translation.ko: 모든 미국 시민이 참여할 수 있을 겁니다
